03f2d23c7660f8fe7b28611a6a93854a.humanReadablePath: Board > translation block comments > index-0 > text

b3cb2d37d49e7d96b70b193f7c9c0e5d.humanReadablePath: Board > translation block comments > index-0 > text
b3cb2d37d49e7d96b70b193f7c9c0e5d.originalText: Alternatively you can import the board class as from a subdirectory; this shaves the bundle size a bit but not a lot though. As the board is the overall entry point for the library.
b3cb2d37d49e7d96b70b193f7c9c0e5d.translation: 你也可以從子目錄導入 board 類別（像是 material UI 那樣）；這樣可以稍微減小 bundle 的大小，但減小的並不多。因為 board 幾乎是整個函式庫的重點。

f5f1b693b8ae5781e55593688c64b1e8.humanReadablePath: Board > alignCoordinateSystem > alignCoordinateSystem > translation block comments > index-0 > text
f5f1b693b8ae5781e55593688c64b1e8.originalText: This is an attribute that determines if the coordinate system should be aligned with the one of the HTML canvas element. The default is true.
f5f1b693b8ae5781e55593688c64b1e8.translation: 這個決定座標軸是否與 HTML Canvas 是一致的，預設是一致的。

e6367bc7377cf120b823000c862fe073.humanReadablePath: Board > camera > camera > translation block comments > index-0 > text
e6367bc7377cf120b823000c862fe073.originalText:
The underlying camera of the board. The camera of the board can be switched.
The boundaries are based on camera. Meaning you can have camera with different boundaries, and you can switch between them during runtime.
e6367bc7377cf120b823000c862fe073.translation: 這個是 board 底層的相機，它控制著整個 board 應該顯示的畫面。board 的邊界是屬於相機屬性，這表示你可以有不同邊界的相機，然後可以在執行時切換它們，讓你迅速切換成不同的畫面。

870ca09df3eaef13cbe7997c589661e1.humanReadablePath: Board > context > context > translation block comments > index-0 > text
870ca09df3eaef13cbe7997c589661e1.originalText: The context used to draw stuff on the canvas.
870ca09df3eaef13cbe7997c589661e1.translation: 這是用來畫圖的 `context` ，跟普通 `canvas` 的 `context` 一樣。

f99a0db60b990f589e26e80b0c7bd144.humanReadablePath: Board > controlCenter > controlCenter > translation block comments > index-0 > text
f99a0db60b990f589e26e80b0c7bd144.originalText:
The control center of the board. The control center is responsible for handling the input events and dispatch the events to the pan, zoom, and rotation handlers.
This exists to decouple the input events from the camera. The control center is the middle man. The default control center is just a simple relay. You can implement a control center
that takes in other inputs. For example, an input to start camera animations.
f99a0db60b990f589e26e80b0c7bd144.translation: 這是 board 的控制中心，它負責處理輸入事件並將事件分發給 pan、zoom 和 rotation 處理者。它存在是為了將輸入事件與相機解耦，而控制中心是中間人。預設的控制中心只是一個簡單的中繼站（馬上轉傳沒有做任何處理）。你可以實作一個控制中心，讓它接收其他輸入。例如，接收用於啟動相機動畫的輸入。（我之後會補上範例）

8703b2340c22c0030dcbecec82f72578.humanReadablePath: Board > fullScreen > fullScreen > translation block comments > index-0 > text
8703b2340c22c0030dcbecec82f72578.originalText:
Determines if the board should be full screen. If this is set to true, the width and height of the board will be set to the window's inner width and inner height respectively.
If set to true the width and height of the board will resize with the window.
8703b2340c22c0030dcbecec82f72578.translation: 決定 board 是否要全螢幕。如果設為 true，board 的寬和高會分別設為視窗的內寬和內高。如果設為 true，board 的寬和高會隨著視窗的變化而變化。

2013dad1366e13d339e44962ab9c91ae.humanReadablePath: Board > height > height > translation block comments > index-0 > text
2013dad1366e13d339e44962ab9c91ae.originalText:
This is in sync with the canvas height and the camera view port height. This is not the board's height.
If the limitEntireViewPort is set to true, the min zoom level is updated based on the height.
2013dad1366e13d339e44962ab9c91ae.translation: 視窗的高度，這個高度會跟 canvas 的高度和相機的視窗高度同步。這不是 board 的高度。如果 limitEntireViewPort 設為 true，最小縮放等級會根據高度更新。

5e1b12a6039c974ab9e4c250f97967a8.humanReadablePath: Board > kmtStrategy > kmtStrategy > translation block comments > index-0 > text
5e1b12a6039c974ab9e4c250f97967a8.originalText:
The strategy used to handle the keyboard, mouse events. The default strategy is the DefaultBoardKMTStrategy. 
You can implement your own strategy by implementing the BoardKMTStrategy interface.
5e1b12a6039c974ab9e4c250f97967a8.translation: 這是 board 用來處理鍵盤和滑鼠事件的策略。預設策略是 DefaultBoardKMTStrategy。你可以實作自己的策略，只要跟著 BoardKMTStrategy 介面實作就好。所有輸入策略都會將使用者輸入轉換成輸入事件並傳給輸入觀察者去做下一步的處置。

cd4e8e35c182c55920d6ce1d94816904.humanReadablePath: Board > limitEntireViewPort > limitEntireViewPort > translation block comments > index-0 > text
cd4e8e35c182c55920d6ce1d94816904.originalText:
Determines the behavior of the camera when the camera is at the edge of the boundaries. If set to true, the entire view port would not move beyond the boundaries.
If set to false, only the center of the camera is bounded by the boundaries.
cd4e8e35c182c55920d6ce1d94816904.translation: 這個屬性會影響相機在邊界的移動準則，如果是 true 的話，整個視窗不會超出邊界。如果是 false 的話，只有相機的中心會受到邊界的限制。

1f38c9f1d09395bd3988b6ddf2a99ed4.humanReadablePath: Board > maxHalfTransHeight > maxHalfTransHeight > translation block comments > index-0 > text
1f38c9f1d09395bd3988b6ddf2a99ed4.originalText: The max translation height of the camera. This is the maximum distance the camera can move in the vertical direction.
1f38c9f1d09395bd3988b6ddf2a99ed4.translation: 相機能夠在垂直方向移動的最大距離。

e7ec0f4e2454def92f7950b0fea00543.humanReadablePath: Board > maxHalfTransWidth > maxHalfTransWidth > translation block comments > index-0 > text
e7ec0f4e2454def92f7950b0fea00543.originalText: The max translation width of the camera. This is the maximum distance the camera can move in the horizontal direction.
e7ec0f4e2454def92f7950b0fea00543.translation: 相機能夠在水平方向移動的最大距離。

4412252ac4718dad951a0459f98865bc.humanReadablePath: Board > panHandler > panHandler > translation block comments > index-0 > text
4412252ac4718dad951a0459f98865bc.originalText:
The pan handler of the board. The pan handler is responsible for handling the pan events issued to the camera.
It has the final say on how the camera should move. Restrictions and clamping behavior are implemented in the pan handler.
4412252ac4718dad951a0459f98865bc.translation: 平移的處理者，負責處理平移事件。它對相機的移動行為模式有最終的決定權。所有的限制和平移的箝制行為都是在這個處理者中實作的。

ac26c9efd1463528e67a334a4536d93f.humanReadablePath: Board > touchStrategy > touchStrategy > translation block comments > index-0 > text
ac26c9efd1463528e67a334a4536d93f.originalText:
The strategy used to handle touch events. The default strategy is the DefaultTouchStrategy.
You can implement your own strategy by implementing the BoardTouchStrategy interface.
ac26c9efd1463528e67a334a4536d93f.translation: 這是 board 用來處理觸控事件的策略。預設策略是 DefaultBoardTouchStrategy。你可以實作自己的策略，只要跟著 BoardTouchStrategy 介面實作就好。所有輸入策略都會將使用者輸入轉換成輸入事件並傳給輸入觀察者去做下一步的處置。

b3349587dd0eba92ef1b6cb7ab29331f.humanReadablePath: Board > width > width > translation block comments > index-0 > text
b3349587dd0eba92ef1b6cb7ab29331f.originalText:
This is in sync with the canvas width and the camera view port width. This is not the board's width.
If the limitEntireViewPort is set to true, the min zoom level is updated based on the width of the canvas.
b3349587dd0eba92ef1b6cb7ab29331f.translation: 視窗的寬度，這個寬度會跟 canvas 的寬度和相機的視窗寬度同步。這不是 board 的寬度。如果 limitEntireViewPort 設為 true，最小縮放等級會根據寬度更新。

e70105ab9b55d3f7fb2fa0a689c1595c.humanReadablePath: Board > zoomHandler > zoomHandler > translation block comments > index-0 > text
e70105ab9b55d3f7fb2fa0a689c1595c.originalText:
The zoom handler of the board. The zoom handler is responsible for handling the zoom events issued to the camera.
It has the final say on how the camera should zoom. Restrictions and clamping behavior are implemented in the zoom handler.
e70105ab9b55d3f7fb2fa0a689c1595c.translation: 縮放的處理者，負責處理縮放事件。它對相機的縮放行為模式有最終的決定權。所有的限制和縮放的箝制行為都是在這個處理者中實作的。

2ff4f44f92273924c6b8a35a59982012.humanReadablePath: Board > convertWindowPoint2WorldCoord > convertWindowPoint2WorldCoord > translation block comments > index-0 > text
2ff4f44f92273924c6b8a35a59982012.originalText: Converts a point from window coordinates to world coordinates.
2ff4f44f92273924c6b8a35a59982012.translation: 將視窗中的座標轉換成世界座標

9f20911649577e34491fc6d2cd11a16d.humanReadablePath: Board > on > on > translation block comments > index-0 > text
9f20911649577e34491fc6d2cd11a16d.originalText: Add an camera movement event listener. The events are "pan", "zoom", and "rotate".
9f20911649577e34491fc6d2cd11a16d.translation: 監聽相機的移動事件。可以監聽的事件有 "pan" （平移）、"zoom"（縮放） 和 "rotate"（旋轉）。

1325dd3798556978b9eeca4b21e0348f.humanReadablePath: Board > onInput > onInput > translation block comments > index-0 > text
1325dd3798556978b9eeca4b21e0348f.originalText:
Add an input event listener. The events are "pan", "zoom", and "rotate". This is different from the camera event listener as this is for input events. 
Input event does not necesarily mean that the camera will move. The input event is the event that is triggered when the user interacts with the board.
1325dd3798556978b9eeca4b21e0348f.translation:
監聽 board 的使用者輸入事件，可以監聽的事件有 "pan"（平移）、"zoom"（縮放）和 "rotate"（旋轉）。這跟相機的移動事件不同，這是針對使用者輸入的事件。
使用者輸入事件不一定會導致相機移動，這只是使用者與 board 互動時觸發的事件。

5ab09ffb90c86a2b9b3dcb805140a776.humanReadablePath: Board > setup > setup > translation block comments > index-0 > text
5ab09ffb90c86a2b9b3dcb805140a776.originalText: This function is used to set up the board. It adds all the event listeners and starts the resize observer and the attribute observer.
5ab09ffb90c86a2b9b3dcb805140a776.translation: 這是給 board 去重新設置事件監聽器，並且啟動 resize observer 和 attribute observer。（目前不是很穩定建議不要使用這個因為 contructor 就會設置好需要的東西了）

6dbe78e6c1aad4d669e22fb774209a58.humanReadablePath: Board > step > step > translation block comments > index-0 > text
6dbe78e6c1aad4d669e22fb774209a58.originalText: This is the step function that is called in the animation frame. This function is responsible for updating the canvas context and the camera state.
6dbe78e6c1aad4d669e22fb774209a58.translation: 這是 board 用來推進動畫的函式，這個函式會在每一個動畫幀被呼叫。這個函式負責更新 canvas 的內容和相機的狀推進

5586f967bb43f1a0a3c3af36109fc6e6.humanReadablePath: Board > tearDown > tearDown > translation block comments > index-0 > text
5586f967bb43f1a0a3c3af36109fc6e6.originalText: This function is used to clean up the board. It removes all the event listeners and disconnects the resize observer and the attribute observer.
5586f967bb43f1a0a3c3af36109fc6e6.translation: 這是用來清理 board 的函式，它會移除所有的事件監聽器，並且斷開 resize observer 和 attribute observer。

a6ab4c4abca12dec912f4f176ae40713.humanReadablePath: InputObserver > translation block comments > index-0 > text
a6ab4c4abca12dec912f4f176ae40713.originalText: This is the observer class that listens to input events and notifies the control center.
a6ab4c4abca12dec912f4f176ae40713.translation: 這是使用者輸入觀察者，它監聽使用者輸入事件並通知控制中心。
